content.0: Born and raised in Salvador, a puzzle enthusiast and a fan of The Big Bang Theory. I am passionate about technology and firmly believe in its transformative potential.
content.1: As a full-stack Software Developer, I have accumulated experience in front-end (Vue.js and React) and back-end (Node.js), and I am constantly seeking ways to enhance my knowledge.
content.2: My professional goal is to elevate my knowledge level and continue working as a Back-end and/or Front-end Software Developer.
content.3: I enjoy being challenged, as challenges drive my professional growth. Autonomy and discipline were skills I developed through remote studies, I have ease in working in a team and commitment to my goals.
